description:
The West Coast didn't get it's nickname for no reason... Pull on this wide brim hat for protection against unpredictable weather. The fully waterproof fabric and shaped brim keep water away from your head while you brave showers or downpours.

  • Breathable 2-layer waterproof nylon with a DWR finish to protect you from the rain
  • Fully taped seams prevent water from seeping in
  • Polyester mesh lining and recycled polyester sweatband wicks moisture away from your head
  • Adjustable buckle and webbing fine-tunes the fit
name: MEC Wet Coast Waterproof Wide Brim Hat - Unisex
